description: A quickstart to setup the Prometheus Node.js Exporter with preconfigured dashboards, alerting rules, and recording rules.

panels.description: The version of Node.js.
panels.title: Node.js Version

panels.description: The number of times Node.js restarted.
panels.title: Node.js Restarts

panels.description: This panel displays the exact timestamp of when the Node.js application started, based on the process_start_time_seconds metric. The timestamp is shown in a human-readable format and is adjusted to the local timezone of the user's browser for better clarity.
panels.title: Process Start Time

panels.description: Displays the uptime of the Node.js application, calculated from the process start time.
panels.title: Application Uptime

panels.description: CPU usage.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: CPU time spent.
panels.title: CPU Time Spent

panels.description: Memory usage.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Number of active handle and active requests.
panels.title: Active Handlers and Requests

panels.description: Latency of the event loop.
panels.title: Event Loop Latency

panels.description: Rate of garbage collection duration.
panels.title: GC Duration Rate

panels.description: Duration of garbage collection.
panels.title: GC Duration

panels.description: Usage of heap memory.
panels.title: Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: Rate of garbage collection.
panels.title: GC Rate

panels.description: Count of garbage collection.
panels.title: GC Count

panels.description: Usage of heap space.
panels.title: Heap Space Used

panels.description: Displays the overall count of incoming HTTP requests for the selected service.
panels.title: Total HTTP Requests

panels.description: This panel displays the total count of HTTP requests that resulted in client or server errors (status codes in the 4xx and 5xx range) for the selected job and instance. Requests related to Prometheus endpoints are excluded, allowing you to focus on user-facing error responses.
panels.title: Total HTTP Error Requests (4xx/5xx)

panels.description: This gauge panel displays the total increase in HTTP requests over the currently selected time range. It dynamically calculates the increase for the chosen job and instance while excluding any endpoints containing "prometheus," providing a clear view of request activity within the specified period.
panels.title: HTTP Request Count (Selected Time Range)

panels.description: This gauge panel displays the increase in HTTP error requests—those with client or server error status codes (4xx and 5xx)—over the currently selected time range. It dynamically calculates the error count for the specified job and instance while excluding any endpoints related to Prometheus, providing clear insight into error trends during the chosen period.
panels.title: HTTP Error Request Increase (4xx/5xx)

panels.description: Presents a breakdown of requests based on URL paths for the selected service, excluding those containing "prometheus" to focus on user-relevant endpoints.
panels.title: HTTP Requests by Path

panels.description: Illustrates the distribution of responses by status code, giving insight into success and error rates while filtering out URLs that include "prometheus".
panels.title: HTTP Requests by Status Code (Incl prometheus)

panels.description: Shows the distribution of incoming requests by HTTP method (such as GET or POST) for the selected service, while filtering out requests with "prometheus" in the URL.
panels.title: HTTP Requests by Method

title: Url Shortener Notification Service
